item.description:
If you would like a t-shirt  with our logo on it,  please sign up for this meetup.

The cost for the shirts is as follows:

$10.00 for a t-shirt.  Any size over XL add $2.00

Sizes and colors are as follows:

Small-5XL

Black, Navy, Forest Green, Irish Green, Maroon, Dark Gray, Light Blue, Light Pink and Sand

 

 

 

After the funds have been collected and orders placed,  we will set up another meetup date for people to collect their shirts in conjunction with a dog walk or event.

 

If you want more than one t-shirt, select it in the number of guests.  In the rsvp questions,  list the size and color of each shirt you want. To pay for the t-shirts, please send a check to: The Granite Moose, 304 Titus Ave, Manchester, NH 03103.  If you need to pay by credit card, please contact Mary at the email below and add $1.50 for processing charges.

If you have questions,  please contact Mary at

blacklab08022@comcast.net

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Shirts.....shirts .....and more shirts - tshirts of course
